data.name: Star Melody Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 4
data.detailed_description:
A World-Saving Magical Girl Rhythm Adventure Game！
With the power of the bond between heroine and hero, step through the gate to the world of dreams.

This is the fourth chapter of Kugado Studio's famed "Kuroneko-san Team", their first completely new game in ten years!

Chapter 4: A Family's Warmth

It's evening, and a young girl sits alone on the park bench. Her name is Suzune.
Why does no one come to her aid?
Isn't there anything we can do for her?
I'm still struggling to come up with answers when it happens.
Suzune shows up at our school looking for help.
The next thing I know, I've decided to take her home with me.
What will Mom say? I'm sure she'll understand.
I just grabbed Suzune's hand and didn't let go.
How was I to know what that would end up leading to?

※This product is the fourth chapter of a 12-part series.

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Environment capable of 1280 x 720, full-color display
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Star Melody Yumemi Dreamer - Chapter 4

content_descriptors.notes: Visual Novel with mature theme, some nudity and sexual content.
